item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: Hello, World! N种语言的Hello, World! Shell #!/bin/sh echo "Hello, World!" Fortran program main implicit none print *,"Hello, World!" end program main C #include <stdio.h> int main() { printf("Hello, World"); return 0; } Python print("Hello, World!") JavaScript console.log("Hello, World!"); PHP echo 'Hello, World!'; Go package main import "fmt" func main(){ fmt.Print("Hello, World!"); } setTimeout(function(){ console.log("I Love Young!"); alert("Hello, World!"); }, 5000);
